name: Improved Fireball
baseDescription: Reduces the casting time of your Fireball spell by koeff sec.

name: Impact
baseDescription: Gives your Fire spells a 4% chance to stun the target for 2 sec.

name: Ignite
baseDescription: Your critical strikes from Fire damage spells cause the target to burn for an additional 24% of your spell's damage over 4 sec.

name: Flame Throwing
baseDescription: Increases the range of your Fire spells by 3 yards.

name: Improved Fire Blast
baseDescription: Reduces the cooldown of your Fire Blast spell by 1.5 sec.

name: Incinerate
baseDescription: Increases the critical strike chance of your Fire Blast and Scorch spells by 4%.

name: Improved Flamestrike
baseDescription: Increases the critical strike chance of your Flamestrike spell by 5%.

name: Pyroblast
baseDescription: Hurls an immense fiery boulder that causes 148 to 195 Fire damage and an additional 56 Fire damage over 12 sec.

name: Improved Scorch
baseDescription: Your Scorch spells have a 33% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to Fire damage.  This vulnerability increases the Fire damage dealt to your target by 3% and lasts 30 sec.  Stacks up to 5 times.

name: Improved Fire Ward
baseDescription: Causes your Fire Ward to have a 20% chance to reflect Fire spells while active.

name: Master of Elements
baseDescription: Your Fire and Frost spell criticals will refund 10% of their base mana cost.

name: Critical Mass
baseDescription: Increases the critical strike chance of your Fire spells by 2%.

name: Blast Wave
baseDescription: A wave of flame radiates outward from the caster, damaging all enemies caught within the blast for 159 to 192 Fire damage, and dazing them for 6 sec.

name: Fire Power
baseDescription: Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 4%.

name: Combustion
baseDescription: When activated, this spell causes each of your Fire damage spell hits to increase your critical strike chance with Fire damage spells by 10%.  This effect lasts until you have caused 3 critical strikes with Fire spells.
